text:
Hello, I am seeing a behavior I hadn't experienced before.
I am making *changes* locally to a `module` and I've always been able to refresh the website created from the `template` where this module is being used and see the changes. But, all of a sudden, anytime I refresh the website, I cannot see the changes. However, if I go to `Website Pages` and create a new one from the same `template`, the module is updated with new changes. I can see them too when I open the `Live Preview` .

Any idea of why this may have happened?
We’ve been experiencing the same thing today, really screwed me up very early this morning. As a workaround, had to turn hsDebug on in the Chrome extension and constantly refresh the cache buster.
<@UJQNNKKHN> that made the trick. Thanks! But I can't think of this being the new way of testing things
No, hopefully this is only a temporary issue. I’m surprised there aren’t more people complaining about this, so wondering if it’s only affecting certain portals.
